Package othello

Class Game

java.lang.Object
othello.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
othello.Game class: Initialisation of everything related to the game.

      Current state of the game.

    • input

      public boolean input
      Parameter that dictates if the game will ask player's moves with coordinates or keyboard (z; q; s; d; e) false = keyboard; true = coordinates

      Parameter that dictates if the game will display emojis or letters false = letters; true = emojis

  • Method Details

    • setPlayerType

      public void setPlayerType()
      Select the type of both players between 4 available options

    • setDisplaySettings

      public boolean setDisplaySettings()
      Selects display type between letters and emojis
      Returns:
      true (emojis) if 1; false (letters) if 0

    • setInputSettings

      public boolean setInputSettings()
      Selects input settings between keyboard and coordinates
      Returns:
      true (coordinates) if 1; false (keyboard) if 0

    • setDepth

      public int setDepth()
      Select depth of AI
      Returns:
      returns integer containing depth of AI

    • setSize

      public int setSize()
      Select size of board Must be an even integer due to the first four cells at the center.

    • opponentTurn

      public GameState opponentTurn(GameState player)
      Method to get opponent's turn
      Parameters:
      player - current player
      Returns:
      returns opponent's turn

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Method to change turns: If opponent can play: change turn If opponent can't play: don't change turn If you and opponent can't play: end game

    • winner

      public GameState winner()
      Returns GameState enum containing player who won the game
      Returns:
      BLACK_WIN if black won, WHITE_WIN if white won, DRAW if draw

    • printWinner

      public void printWinner()
      Prints winner of the current game
